dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1092 PCS: To designate the air route traffic control center located in Nashua, New Hampshire, as the Patricia Clark Boston Air Route Traffic Control Center.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: To designate the air route traffic control center located in Nashua, New Hampshire, as the Patricia Clark Boston Air Route Traffic Control Center.

section.header: Designation of Patricia Clark Boston Air Route Traffic Control Center

subsection.text: The air route traffic control center located in Nashua, New Hampshire, and any successor air route traffic control center at that location, shall be known and designated as the Patricia Clark Boston Air Route Traffic Control Center.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the air route traffic control center referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Patricia Clark Boston Air Route Traffic Control Center.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives June 25, 2013.

endorsement.action-desc: Received; read twice and placed on the calendar
